data.name: HelloMessage
data.value: Hello! I can handle links from streaming services. You can send me a link to a track, album or artist, and I will try to reply with a link to the same music in another service. At the moment I can work with Yandex Music and Spotify. To start we need determine Streaming Services that we will use. Send /set_services command to do this.

data.name: NotFoundServicesMessage
data.value: There are no services installed for this chat between which I could convert. Use the /set_services command to do this

data.name: ServicesInChatMessage
data.value: Services for converting in this chat:

data.name: SetServicesFirstMessage
data.value: Select services for this chat, You can select two or more services

data.name: MusicNotFoundMessage
data.value: Sorry, I cant't found anything. Here is Search Results, You can check it Yourself:

data.name: CantProcessMessage
data.value: Sorry, I don't know what to do whith this request. You can send /help to see how I'm working.

data.name: HelpMessage
data.value: I can handle links from streaming services. You can send me a link to a track, album or artist, and I will try to reply with a link to the same music in another service. At the moment I can work with Yandex Music and Spotify. To set services between which I will convert in this chat use /set_services command. To view services in this chat use /get_services. If You have questions or suggestions please contact author: @Feelatoff

data.name: ServiceIsNotInChatMessage
data.value: Streaming Service from Link above is not active n this chat.

data.name: WrongUriMessage
data.value: This is not a link to a Streaming Service or I don't know this service yet, or I don't know what to do with this tye of content

data.name: NotEnoughServicesMessage
data.value: Please, select at least two services for this chat!
